equipment_type.description: Full body armor that appears to be of military issue. Androids with this armor are able to blend in military bases. Even if it is disguised, enemy scans will detect an android that is marked defective.
equipment_type.strategy_tip_optional: It's mildly protective, but makes android bulky and slow unless you improve it.

equipment_type.description: It's just cloth and leather, but it obscures the body and the face. Allows new android forms to blend into crowds. Even if it is disguised, enemy scans will detect an android that is marked defective.
equipment_type.strategy_tip_optional: Variations of this getup are worn by freelance detectives and bodyguards. Cheap enough for the lower and working classes to afford them.

equipment_type.description: A thinner form of full chromium body armor. Does not restrict movement.
Armor that covers the upper body and head of an android with thick depleted uranium.
equipment_type.strategy_tip_optional: The fact that your androids can move at all is a testament to your engineering acumen.

equipment_type.description: Full body armor made from tungsten carbonyl. Protective but bulky.
equipment_type.strategy_tip_optional: Perhaps only useful for bulk squads that will not move.

equipment_type.description: This thin coating of graphene mesh can be applied over any android form.
equipment_type.strategy_tip_optional: Enhanced with technology similar to microbuilders, this coating enhances mobility and strength.

equipment_type.description: A thin coating of cubic boron, which looks like diamond under a microscope. It is invisible to casual visual inspection.
equipment_type.strategy_tip_optional: Provides strong protection for an android. No apparent trade-offs.

equipment_type.description: A hexagonal polymorph at the microscopic level. It makes your units look black to enemies, hiding any damage they may have sustained, so that Deterrence does not drop as this unit takes damage.
equipment_type.strategy_tip_optional: Wurtzite is also 18% stronger than diamond.

equipment_type.description: Large exoskeleton arms that attach alongside those of the Android.
equipment_type.strategy_tip_optional: Greatly increases strength and range, but slows the Android and provides no protection.
